Extension_Description.message: Live preview of CSS/Less/Sass code changes. Auto-save file, autocomplete, Less/Sass to CSS, beautify, CSS reloader, lint, ...

Extension_Name.message: Live editor for CSS, Less & Sass - Magic CSS

Include_CanRunOnOtherPages.message: You can run it on other websites and web pages.

Include_GrantPermisssions.message: And grant permissions by enabling "Allow access to file URLs" for this extension

Include_MagicssDoesNotOperateOnSomeTabs.message: For security reasons, Magic CSS does not operate on:

Include_RequiresYourPermission.message: It requires your permission to execute on:
